FuncDef: This command displays statistical OSPF3 neighbor information at the configured interval until the configured count is reached.
CLIs: neighbor <router-id> <interface-name> [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ] area <area-id>

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the interface name, up to 32 characters.
Configures the interval for each display, in seconds. Values-3 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Configures the number of times the command is repeated. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Displays raw statistics, without processing. No calculations are performed on the delta or rate statistics.
Displays rate-per-second for each statistic instead of the delta.
Specifies the OSPF area, up to 256 characters.
